title: Opinion: Former FDA commissioner: HHS leadership is focused on policy-based evidence, not evidence-based policy
description: “Doctors are not a flock of free-range chickens wandering about offices and hospitals and making up best practices, one clinician at the time,” writes Robert Califf.
content: “Doctors are not a flock of free-range chickens wandering about offices and hospitals and making up best practices, one clinician at the time,” writes Robert Califf.
